components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: API Errors With Verify in Indonesia

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate API errors with Verify in Indonesia. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to MegaFon Network in Russia

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery to MegaFon network in Russia. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to the MegaFon network in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the MegaFon network in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MegaFon network in Russia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 May 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 03 May 2025 at 19:45 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body:
The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 06 May 2025 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets when sending via long codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 05 May 2025 at 04:00 PDT
05 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 06 May 2025 at 04:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Interconnect Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct planned maintenance on the Australia Twilio network from 07 May 2025 at 6:00 PDT until 07 May 2025 at 12:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, no service disruptions are expected. Although redundancy may be temporarily lost, the service itself will remain unaffected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 07 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 29 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

07 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 08 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
14 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 16 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
21 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 22 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
28 May 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 29 May 2025 at 00:00 PDT
